channel.title: Blocks on Scenic-Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Blocks on Scenic-Shop

item.title: Pianos & Steel. CAD Block Giveaway!
item.description: I just realized I never posted those grand piano cad blocks I promised months ago. You can snag them here (version 2k). Egg. face. mine. While I’m at it - this is a link to some commonly used steel profile blocks. Some of them are dynamic, so you’ll need a newer (2006? I’m too lazy to look it up right now) version of autocad to utilize them. Inside you’ll find:

item.title: Dykes Moulding - CAD Blocks
item.description: Looking for a collection of the Dykes Lumber moulding profiles in CAD format? Here you go. Download the Dykes Moulding file here. (381 kb) The profiles have been compiled into a single file, each profile a separate block. (Design Center users rejoice!) This file is in v2000 format. Much thanks goes to Adam Godbout for providing the file. Happy CADDing. Edit: The following download contains the collection of Dykes profiles in individual dxf files.

item.title: Dykes Moulding - CAD Files
item.description: If you’ve downloaded the Dykes Moulding CAD files from their website you may have noticed that the profiles are not to scale. From what I could see, the scale factor seems to be the same for all the files, approximately 0.056568174.
